attributes.action: Stop Penalising the working classes for the mistakes made by the rich
attributes.additional_details:
This is a public vote against Austerity measures, along with high taxes, rising food costs, petrol/diesel going through the roof, reckless spending by elected officials all going unchecked and falsely justified whilst the working classes continue to pay through the noses while big companies continue to receive tax breaks,
We the general population are against these measures, we didn't vote these changes in and we want a stop to it ALL
